cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: Countless xenos cults dwell unseen within the Imperium, lurking just beneath the surface.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.
foreignNames.flavor: Am Anfang war es nur ein Wassertropfen. Der Zauberspiegel ließ es zu viel mehr kristallisieren.

foreignNames.name: Sello arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color en la identidad de color de tu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Comenzó como una simple gota de agua, pero el Espejo Mágico hizo que cristalizara en algo mucho más poderoso.

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.
foreignNames.flavor: Il n'était au départ qu'une simple goutte d'eau que le Miroir magique cristallisa en quelque chose d'autre.

foreignNames.name: Sigillo Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore nell'identità di colore del tuo comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Al principio era una semplice goccia d'acqua. Lo Specchio Magico la cristallizzò in qualcosa di molto più grande.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色のうち好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 初めはほんの一滴だが、魔法の鏡がそれ以上のものを形にする。

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Começou como uma simples gota d'água. O Espelho Mágico a cristalizou em algo muito maior.

foreignNames.name: Магическая Печать
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета из цветовой принадлежности вашего командира.
foreignNames.flavor: Сперва это была простая капля воды. Волшебное Зеркало превратило ее в нечто большее.

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
foreignNames.flavor: 它起初就只是水滴。魔法明镜将之晶化为更有用的事物。

foreignNames.name: 秘法印記
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一點魔法力，其顏色為你指揮官標識色中的任一顏色。
foreignNames.flavor: 它起初就只是水滴。魔法明鏡將之晶化為更有用的事物。

cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.setName: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor:
"To feel no constraint but the four points of a compass, to tread a path that only you can find . . . these are the flavors of power I've learned to savor."
—Keon, horizon walker

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Keine Einschränkungen außer den vier Himmelsrichtungen zu spüren, einen Weg zu beschreiten, den nur du finden kannst … Das sind die Aromen der Macht, die ich zu genießen gelernt habe."
—Keon der Horizontwanderer

foreignNames.name: Sello arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color en la identidad de color de tu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"No sentir más limitación que los cuatro puntos de una brújula, forjar un camino que solo uno puede encontrar... Aprendí a apreciar las posibilidades de ese poder".
—Keon, caminante del horizonte

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Ne ressentir aucune contrainte sinon les quatre points d'une boussole, prendre un chemin que vous seul pouvez trouver... ce sont les arômes du pouvoir que j'ai appris à savourer. »
—Keon, arpenteur de l'horizon

foreignNames.name: Sigillo Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore nell'identità di colore del tuo comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Non sentire alcun vincolo se non i quattro punti cardinali, percorrere un sentiero che solo tu puoi trovare... Sono queste le sfumature del potere che ho imparato ad assaporare."
—Keon, viandante dell'orizzonte

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor:
「コンパスが指し示す四つの方角以外には何にも縛られず、自分だけが探せる道を歩む……私は、その力の趣を楽しむことを学んできた。」
――地平線を歩むもの、キオン

foreignNames.name: 신비한 인장
foreignNames.text: {T}: 커맨더의 색 정체성에 일치하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"나침반의 네 점 외에는 제약을 느끼지 않고, 오직 자신만이 찾을 수 있는 길을 걷는다 . . . 이게 내가 음미하는 방법을 배운 힘의 맛이지."
—지평선 활보자, 케온

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Não sentir nenhuma limitação além dos quatro pontos cardinais, seguir um caminho que só você pode encontrar... esse é o sabor do poder que eu aprendi a apreciar."
— Keon, andarilho do horizonte

foreignNames.name: Магическая Печать
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета из цветовой принадлежности вашего командира.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Не знать никаких ограничений, кроме четырех точек компаса, идти по пути, который можешь найти только ты... вот тот вкус могущества, который я научился смаковать».
— Кеон, странник горизонтов

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
foreignNames.flavor:
「不受任何拘束，跟随罗盘四方指向，闯出一条只有自己能开辟的道路…这些正是我学会品味的力量滋味。」
～边界行者奇安

foreignNames.name: 秘法印記
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一點魔法力，其顏色為你指揮官標識色中的任一顏色。
foreignNames.flavor:
「不受任何拘束，跟隨羅盤四方指向，闖出一條只有自己能開闢的道路…這些正是我學會品味的力量滋味。」
～邊界行者奇安

cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: Matic had only taken the ring to appease his grandmother when she'd pressed it insistently into his palm. As the rats scurried away from its light, he understood her urgency.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.
foreignNames.flavor: Matic hatte den Ring nur genommen, um seine Großmutter zu besänftigen, als sie ihn drängend in seine Handfläche gedrückt hatte. Als die Ratten von seinem Licht wegwuselten, verstand er, warum es ihr so dringlich gewesen war.

foreignNames.name: Sello arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color en la identidad de color de tu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Matic solo se llevó el anillo para contentar a su abuela, que acostumbraba a presionarlo insistentemente contra su mano. Cuando vio que las ratas huían de su luz, lo entendió todo.

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.
foreignNames.flavor: Matic ne prit l'anneau que pour apaiser sa grand-mère quand elle le pressa dans sa paume avec insistance. Quand les rats se mirent à fuir sa lueur, il comprit son importance.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: マティックは、指輪をしつこく手の中に押し込んできた祖母をなだめるため、それを受け取ったに過ぎなかった。ネズミたちがちょこまかと光から遠ざかり、彼は一刻を争う事態を自覚した。

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
foreignNames.flavor: 马提奇才刚取下戒指想要让祖母安心，就被对方一把攥紧握在掌中。直到察觉迸发光芒下老鼠四处逃窜，他才明白祖母为何会有如此反应。

foreignNames.flavor: Al principio era una semplice goccia d'acqua. Lo Specchio Magico la cristallizzò in qualcosa di molto più grande.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色のうち好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 初めはほんの一滴だが、魔法の鏡がそれ以上のものを形にする。

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Começou como uma simples gota d'água. O Espelho Mágico a cristalizou em algo muito maior.

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
foreignNames.flavor: 它起初就只是水滴。魔法明镜将之晶化为更有用的事物。

foreignNames.name: 秘法印記
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一點魔法力，其顏色為你指揮官標識色中的任一顏色。
foreignNames.flavor: 它起初就只是水滴。魔法明鏡將之晶化為更有用的事物。

cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de n'importe quelle couleur de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色のうち好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。

cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.setName: The Lost Caverns of Ixalan Commander
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor:
"Markings on the hilt are faded, but resemble Komon Winaq familial glyphs. Relic recovered for further study."
—Oltec archaeological survey

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die Markierungen auf dem Griff sind verblasst, ähneln aber den Glyphen des Hauses Komon Winaq. Relikt zur weiteren Untersuchung geborgen."
—Archäologische Untersuchung der Oltec

foreignNames.name: Sello arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color en la identidad de color de tu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Las marcas de la empuñadura están desgastadas, pero se asemejan a los glifos característicos de los komon winaq. Reliquia recuperada para estudiarla con mayor profundidad".
—Investigación arqueológica oltec

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Les marques sur la garde sont presque effacées, mais elles ressemblent aux glyphes de la famille Komon Winaq. Nous avons récupéré la relique pour une étude plus approfondie. »
—Étude archéologique oltèque

foreignNames.name: Sigillo Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore nell'identità di colore del tuo comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Le incisioni sull'elsa sono consumate, ma ricordano i glifi familiari di Komon Winaq. Reliquia recuperata per ulteriori studi."
—Sopralluogo archeologico Oltec

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor:
「柄にある印は掠れているものの、コモン・ウィナク一族の象形文字に酷似している。さらなる調査のため、遺物は回収する。」
――オルテカの考古学的調査

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Embora apagadas, as marcas no punho se assemelham a glifos familiares de Komon Winaq. Relíquia recuperada para estudos posteriores."
— Pesquisa arqueológica dos Oltec

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
foreignNames.flavor:
「锤柄上的印记已难以辨认，但看起来像是科门维纳家族的徽章。已回收古物作深入分析。」
～欧尔特克考古勘察纪录

cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

cards.name: Arcane Signet
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor:
"Magic rings are, well, magical; and they are rare and curious."
—Gandalf

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Magische Ringe sind, nun ja, magisch, und sie sind selten und seltsam."
—Gandalf

foreignNames.name: Sello arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color en la identidad de color de tu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los anillos mágicos son… Bueno, mágicos: raros y curiosos".
—Gandalf

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Les anneaux magiques sont... magiques ; et ils sont rares et étranges. »
—Gandalf

foreignNames.name: Sigillo Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore nell'identità di colore del tuo comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Gli anelli magici sono, come dire... magici; inoltre sono strani e rari."
—Gandalf

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor:
「魔法の指輪というものは――さよう、魔力がある。そうした指輪は類い希で、興味深いものじゃ。」
――ガンダルフ

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Anéis mágicos são... bem... mágicos; eles são raros e curiosos."
— Gandalf

foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore nell'identità di colore del tuo comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Al principio era una semplice goccia d'acqua. Lo Specchio Magico la cristallizzò in qualcosa di molto più grande.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 初めはほんの一滴だが、魔法の鏡がそれ以上のものを形にする。

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Começou como uma simples gota d'água. O Espelho Mágico a cristalizou em algo muito maior.

foreignNames.name: Магическая Печать
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета из цветовой принадлежности вашего командира.

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记

cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
cards.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

rulings.text: If you don't have a commander, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana.
If you have two commanders, the ability adds one mana of any color in their combined color identities.
If your commander is a card that has no colors in its color identity, Arcane Signet's ability produces no mana. It doesn't produce {C}.

foreignNames.name: Arkanes Petschaft
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe der Farbidentität deines Kommandeurs.
foreignNames.flavor: Am Anfang war es nur ein Wassertropfen. Der Zauberspiegel ließ es zu viel mehr kristallisieren.

foreignNames.name: Sello arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color en la identidad de color de tu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Comenzó como una simple gota de agua, pero el Espejo Mágico hizo que cristalizara en algo mucho más poderoso.

foreignNames.name: Cachet d'ésotérisme
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix de l'identité couleur de votre commandant.
foreignNames.flavor: Il n'était au départ qu'une simple goutte d'eau que le Miroir magique cristallisa en quelque chose d'autre.

foreignNames.name: Sigillo Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore nell'identità di colore del tuo comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Al principio era una semplice goccia d'acqua. Lo Specchio Magico la cristallizzò in qualcosa di molto più grande.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀の印鑑
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたの統率者の固有色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 初めはほんの一滴だが、魔法の鏡がそれ以上のものを形にする。

foreignNames.name: Sinete Arcano
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor da identidade de cor de seu comandante.
foreignNames.flavor: Começou como uma simples gota d'água. O Espelho Mágico a cristalizou em algo muito maior.

cards.originalText: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

foreignNames.name: Магическая Печать
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета из цветовой принадлежности вашего командира.
foreignNames.flavor: Сперва это была простая капля воды. Волшебное Зеркало превратило ее в нечто большее.

foreignNames.name: 秘法印记
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。
foreignNames.flavor: 它起初就只是水滴。魔法明镜将之晶化为更有用的事物。
